required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First-in-Human Study of PF-04958242 in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, First-in-Human, Randomized, Subject and Investigator-Blind, Sponsor Open, Single Escalating Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Pf-04958242 in Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study will evaluate the safety and tolerability of single, escalating doses of PF-04958242 administered orally to healthy adult participants. This study will also evaluate the plasma pharmacokinetics (PK) of single doses of PF-04958242 after single escalating doses of PF-04958242 administered orally to healthy adult participants.

detailed_description.textblock: This study was previously posted by Pfizer, Inc. Sponsorship of the trial was transferred to Biogen.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Experiencing Adverse Events
primary_outcome.description: An adverse event is any untoward medical occurrence in a clinical investigation subject administered a product or medical device. A serious adverse event or serious adverse drug reaction is any untoward medical occurrence at any dose that: Results in death; Is life-threatening (immediate risk of death); Requires inpatient hospitalization or prolongation of existing hospitalization; Results in persistent or significant disability/incapacity; Results in congenital anomaly/birth defect.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4
Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve from Time 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC0-inf)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution During the Terminal Elimination Phase (Vz/F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4
Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4
Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Drug Concentration-Time Curve up to the Last Quantifiable Time-Point (AUC0-last)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and at multiple time points up to Day 4

arm_group.description: Period 1: Participants received 0.01 milligrams (mg) of PF-04958242 or matching placebo, once, orally. Period 2: Participants received 0.03 mg of PF-04958242 or matching placebo, once, orally. Period 3: Participants received 0.1 mg of PF-04958242 or matching placebo, once, orally.

Period 1: Participants received 0.3 mg of PF-04958242 or matching placebo, once, orally (fasted). Period 2: Participants received 0.6 mg of PF-04958242 or matching placebo, once, orally. Period 3: Participants received 1.0 mg of PF-04958242 or matching placebo, once, orally (fed).

intervention.description: Administered as specified in the treatment arm
Administered as specified in the treatment arm
